meanings.definition: The inverse function of the cosine function.
meanings.sent1: I used arccosines to find the original angle.
meanings.sent3: The arccosines were feeling rebellious and decided to switch places with the cosines.
meanings.sent4: In the world of trigonometry, arccosines act as detectives, uncovering hidden angles.
meanings.sent5: The concept of arccosines can be tricky, but with practice, it becomes clearer.

meanings.definition: The angle whose cosine is a given number.
meanings.sent1: She calculated the arccosines to determine the angle.
meanings.sent2: Finding the arccosines helps in solving trigonometric equations.
meanings.sent3: The arccosines at the party were all about finding the perfect angle for the group photo.
meanings.sent4: His intuition was like arccosines, always leading him to the right angles in life.
meanings.sent5: Understanding arccosines is like unlocking a secret code to trigonometry.
